name: Display Aversion
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Blood of the Night © 2012, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M (a drop of holy water)
effect: visual figment that cannot extend beyond four 10-ft. cubes + one 10-ft. cube/level (S)
text: This spell functions like minor image, except it always creates an animated illusion of you presenting to a vampire a material, object, or sound that it is averse to, such as garlic, a holy symbol, or bells ringing. You specify what aversion the illusion depicts when you cast the spell. The vampire reacts to the illusion as if it were real; it can overcome the effect by succeeding at a disbelief save or a normal Will save against the illusion's DC (instead of the normal DC 25 to overcome its revulsion). The illusion is only quasireal and cannot otherwise affect creatures.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (一滴圣水)
text_zh: 此法术如同弱效幻影(minor image)般作用，除了此法术总是创造一个在你记忆中吸血鬼厌恶的材料、物体或声音的活动幻象，例如大蒜、一枚圣徽或著钟声。你必须在施法时具体说明幻象所描绘的令人厌恶的东西。吸血鬼与幻象互动时就好像它是真实的；吸血鬼可以透过成功的豁免来不相信此幻象，或是一次正常的意志豁免检定来对抗此幻象的DC(取代正常克服厌恶的DC25)来克服这个效果。此幻象仅是半真实的，并且不能以其他方式来影响生物。
